basics.name: Sheldon Lin
basics.label: Manager in Data&Analytics
basics.summary: Sheldon is a tech team lead in data & analytics with various experience in finance, healthcare, retail and engineering. Sheldon has expertise in risk-based pricing optimisation, customer propensity and churn prediction, demand forecast, asset risk and allocation optimisation. Also, some hands-on experience on building deep learning applications including OCR text extractor, melanoma detector, sentiment analysis and root cause analysis via NLP. Sheldon enjoys the discussions with business owners, end users and senior management to work out the most suitable data architecture and solution for them. A good solution can be simple but also powerful and scalable!

work.name: Capgemini Invent
work.summary: Technical project lead in data science and data engineering
highlights: Leading a team of 5 data scientist and data engineers to deliver data projects for one of Australian big four banks
Achieve millions dollars cost saving for the client by automating their current tech compliance process
Demand forecast and prediction model for ServiceNow events
Visualisation for tech control automation (>4 million records)
Ongoing support for solutions in data architecture and data warehouse
Build applications to do tech compliance scanning on enterprise Github repos and Jira (Rest API)
Provide mentorship for junior data scientists/engineers

work.name: Toyota Finance Australia
work.summary: Data scientist worked cross different business functions
highlights: Scope, design, test and maintain machine learning models in various business areas
Communicate with stakeholders in a cross-functional environment and translate complex machine learning concepts into business solutions
Build data pipelines and partner with data engineering/IT for ETL process
Play a key role in new business initiatives and working groups to tackle ad hoc tasks or new challenges
Review and troubleshoot any data and script issues and recommend improvement
Lead projects and provide support to junior members in the team
Build up strong working knowledge for the organisation on new technology/platforms e.g. Databricks
Build analytics dashboards in PowerBI

work.name: Freelancing
work.summary: Freelanced a few machine learning projects
highlights: Computer vision projects in Prostate Cancer Assessment and Melanoma Classification. Achieved higher accuracy score than human physicist on the test set
NLP sentiment analysis using attention mechanism (Bert) to classify posts in social media that report early signs of natural disasters
Web scraping
Algorithmic trading using reinforcement learning libraries (e.g FinRL)
Building dashboards in Streamlit

awards.title: Let's make it happen
awards.summary: Awarded by Toyota Finance for working in a special working group to address declining finance share in the car loan market

projects.name: Control Testing Automation
highlights: Automate the highly manual tech assurance process within ANZ Banking Group and build live control monitoring
Cross platform data integration. Building a data pipeline as part of the automation process
Demand forecast for ServiceNow Events and predictive analytics
Build applications and logics in Python to perform tech compliance testing on internal Github repos and Jira records (Rest API)

projects.name: Efficient Frontier
highlights: Building a personalised portfolio/asset allocation optimisation app
Implement modern portfolio theory (Efficient frontier), black-litterman allocation, hierarchical risk parity
MVP the app with full stack in vue.js and Django
Prototype the app in Dash

projects.name: Risk-Based Loan Pricing Engine
highlights: End-to-end risk-based pricing engine using machine learning models, already in production. Estimated profit uplift of 40million for the organisation

Build and maintain production level machine learning models to cover the whole loan life cycle from quote, application, approval to settlement as well as the customer behavioural models e.g. early termination, write-off and loss given default
Develop and test the profit optimisation model
Monthly reporting dashboard on model performance and profit tracking

projects.name: OCR text extractor
highlights: Built in-house pdf extractor from scratch given the confidentiality and privacy concern of using external products. And the existing products in the market are not fit for purpose
Achieved more than 95% accuracy when extracting the desired items from pdf documents to excel, by applying an unique methodology (convert pdf to xml file first, then extract the info by Jqueries)
Testing a deep learning based approach  to further develop this tool into a more generalised product, by using transfer learning to fine-tune yolov5 and easyOCR models
Training and testing of deep learning models (Pytorch)
Setting up the model training/deployment pipeline on Azure Databricks

projects.name: Customer Retention Model
highlights: Provide loan lifetime value (risk-based) prediction
Work with sales and marketing team to develop a customer ranking model to prioritise the retention activities
PowerBI dashboard for model monitoring , reporting and tracking the retention journey of customers

projects.name: Phoenix (Salary Packaging Platform)
highlights: Design an algorithm to automatically reconcile salary packaging platform data with more than 2 millions bank transactions  given there are no primary matching keys available
Successfully reduced manual reconciliation works by more than 80%
Support software development team on troubleshooting and debug

projects.name: Customer Propensity Modelling
highlights: Use the data obtained by our marketing team from their Google Analytics platform to analyse the customers’ segment at the quote journey
Use decision tree method to separate the customer segment and provide insight to the marketing team about which type(s) of customers are more likely to get an online car loan quote and converge
Clustering analysis using PCA and K Mean and KNN

projects.name: Sales Pipeline Forecast
highlights: Build time-series forecast for loan application and settlement volume each month, using Facebook Prophet machine learning model
Full MLOps development lifecycle on Azure Databricks (from data extraction, model training, backtesting/validation to scheduled production run all in one platform)
Significantly improved the forecast accuracy for the retail finance and work planning team
Productionised model results have been used to assist the work planning team for resourcing monthly loan application and  settlement works

projects.name: Car Rental / Subscription Pricing Engine
highlights: Support the launch of newly created Toyota car rental/subscription service product - Kinto
Web scraping and dashboard for competitors’ price
Develop a pricing algorithm based on the duration, location and vehicle type

projects.name: Prostate Cancer Assessment
highlights: Develop a deep learning computer vision model (using EfficientNet) to assess prostate cancer
The model can achieve a higher accuracy rate than human radiologists in the test data

projects.name: Tweet Sentiment Analysis
highlights: Applied NLP attention mechanism to train a language model that can read tweets and classify if the tweet was the lead indicator of a natural disaster
Transfer learning of training the final layer of Bert (Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers)model
